revised_title: Dr. Johnson's Connection with the Royal Society
tldr: This article explores the connections between Dr. Samuel Johnson, a prominent 18th-century writer, and the Royal Society. It discusses Johnson's interest in science, his acquaintances with Fellows of the Royal Society, and the influence of scientific literature on his work. The article also highlights the various ways Johnson was connected to the Society through people and books.
